::Firearm/Slayer::

Firearm nods, standing up. "It's allright, we'll get him back."

He looks at Spears. She was probably tired. "Do you want quarters 
assigned to you? I think you can use some rest. You probably don't 
remember, but you've been through alot."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A long way away, oblivious to the fact that a femm was crying about 
his fate, a femm that he wanted to kill, Slayer flies over the land, 
looking around. He was damaged, but internal repairs were underway.

He growls, seeing a wolf running on the ground. Swooping in, he opens 
fire at it, not caring that it was only a common organic wolf.

remember

cage..Striker
